casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Jesus Garcia LOPEZ. No. 95PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Counsel, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of January 2009 by Defendant to Amend Defendant Appellant's New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
